interface.name: SparseRealMatrix
interface.javadoc: Marker interface for {@link RealMatrix} implementations that require sparse backing storage $Id: SparseRealMatrix.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ 2.0 As of version 3.1, this class is deprecated, for reasons exposed in this JIRA ticket. This class will be removed in version 4.0.
